Package org.itemscript.core

Interface Summary
HasSystem Objects implementing this interface have a reference to the JsonSystem object.
JsonSystem A JsonSystem provides access to facilities for parsing, storing, and manipulating JSON values.
JsonUtil An interface defining various utility methods that can't be static but aren't really part of the core JsonSystem interface.
 

Class Summary
ItemscriptSystem The implementation class for JsonSystem.
Params A simple class that implements Map<String, String> and provides a chainable put method for initialization.
